github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Use conventional commit format: type(scope): subject. Limit first line to 72 characters.
Swear liberally for comedic effect. Examples: 'fix(repl): holy shit, finally fixed the memory leak' or 'feat(mcp): fuck yeah, added package search' or 'perf(compiler): christ, made this 10x faster'
Types: feat, fix, refactor, test, docs, chore, perf, style, ci, build. Use present tense imperatives.
